message.body: Hey love! I'm helping out ppl at pig iron recruit and they're wondering about places where actors train in mpls... Do you know of any? Or places where actors congregate to hear of classes/training?
The Guthrie acting class is pretty well attended. Otherwise FRINGE which is now :) MN Playlist is a great forum though. You could put an ad up for some dolla billz.
Awesome, is there a fringe bar?
Oh yeah there is! I don't remember where the after parties are. But it's different than last year, which was motoi.
